sense.gloss: to measure, to weigh, to survey, to time (sound, gauge, estimate)
to conjecture, to infer, to surmise

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓から↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓↑体重|↑↓たいじゅう↓↑量↑↓はか↓る|ことにした。
sdata.e: I have decided to weigh myself every day starting today.
